alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 04 at 3:02AM CDT until August 04 at 4:45AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of east central Missouri, including the following county, Jefferson. * WHEN...Until 900 AM CDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Roads remain closed due to flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 258 AM CDT, local law enforcement reported that several roads were flooded including Highway 141 north of Highway 21. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Arnold, Byrnes Mill, Antonia, Murphy, High Ridge, Barnhart, Oakville, House Springs, Imperial, Scotsdale, Parkdale, Kimmswick and Otto.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
